title: Napi Executor
description: A type definition for the Napi - Bindings Build executor schema

outputPath.title: Output Path
outputPath.description: The path to the output directory

package.title: Package Name
package.description: Build the specified library or the one at cwd

toolchain.title: Toolchain
toolchain.description: The type of toolchain to use for the build

target.title: Target Triple
target.description: Build for the target triple, bypassed to `cargo build --target`

profile.title: Cargo Profile
profile.description: Build artifacts with the specified profile

jsBinding.title: JS Binding File
jsBinding.description: The path to the output JavaScript file

dts.title: DTS Binding File
dts.description: The path to the output TypeScript declaration file

manifestPath.title: Manifest Path
manifestPath.description: The path to the Cargo.toml manifest file

cwd.title: Working Directory
cwd.description: Working directory where napi command will be executed; other paths are relative to this

configPath.title: NAPI Config Path
configPath.description: Path to napi config JSON file

targetDir.title: Cargo Target Dir
targetDir.description: Directory for all crate generated artifacts (cargo build --target-dir)

platform.title: Platform Suffix
platform.description: Add platform triple to generated Node.js binding file, e.g. [name].linux-x64-gnu.node

jsPackageName.title: JS Package Name
jsPackageName.description: Package name in generated JS binding file. Works only with --platform

constEnum.title: Const Enum
constEnum.description: Whether to generate const enum for TypeScript bindings

noJsBinding.title: Disable JS Binding
noJsBinding.description: Disable generation of JS binding file. Works only with --platform

dtsHeader.title: DTS Header
dtsHeader.description: Custom file header for generated type def file (requires typedef feature)

noDtsHeader.title: Disable Default DTS Header
noDtsHeader.description: Disable default file header for generated type def file (requires typedef feature)

esm.title: ESM Output
esm.description: Emit an ESM JS binding file instead of CJS (works only with --platform)

strip.title: Strip Binary
strip.description: Strip the library to minimize file size

crossCompile.title: Cross Compile
crossCompile.description: [experimental] Cross-compile for the specified target with cargo-xwin on Windows and cargo-zigbuild on other platforms

useNapiCross.title: Use @napi-rs/cross-toolchain
useNapiCross.description: [experimental] Use @napi-rs/cross-toolchain to cross-compile Linux arm/arm64/x64 gnu targets

watch.title: Watch
watch.description: Watch crate changes and build continuously with cargo-watch

noDefaultFeatures.title: No Default Features
noDefaultFeatures.description: Do not activate the default feature
